data.text: Then Yahweh gave me another message. He said:
“You human, give to the king of Tyre this message from me, Yahweh the Lord:
You think that you are wiser than Daniel was,
By being wise and understanding a lot, you have become very rich;
Yes, it is true that by trading wisely, you have been enabled to become very rich,
Therefore, this is what Yahweh the Lord says:
I will now bring a foreign army to attack your country,
They will bring you down to your grave;
Then you will certainly not [RHQ] say to those who are killing you,
You will die like other people who are unacceptable to me die,
Yahweh also gave me this message:
“You human, sing a sad/funeral song about the king of Tyre. Say to him, ‘This is what Yahweh the Lord says:
You had a wonderful life, as though you were in my beautiful garden in Eden.
I appointed [DOU] you to be like [MET] a strong angel to guard the people.
You were completely good in all that you did,
Then you became busy trading things,
You were extremely proud
By committing many sins
All the people who knew what your city was like previously
Then Yahweh gave me another message. He said,
“You human, turn toward Sidon city, and declare the terrible things that will happen to it.
Give the people of Sidon this message from me, Yahweh the Lord:
I will send a plague upon you,

No longer will those who live near you people of Israel hurt you like [MET] painful briers and sharp thorns hurt people. And then the Israeli people will know that I, Yahweh, have the power to do what I say that I will do.”

And this is also what Yahweh the Lord says: “Some day the people of Israel will live in their own land again, the land that I gave to Jacob, who also served me. I will gather them from distant countries where I have scattered them. And I will reveal to the nations that I am holy among my people.

My people will live safely in Israel; they will build houses and plant vineyards. And when I punish the nearby nations that despised them, they will know that it is I, Yahweh their God, who has done it.”
